name: Slipspace Escapades
description:
After a heist against some local space king, he's decided to that you must die. Now it's time for you to slip away... through Slipspace.

Fight your way through a hectic one minute journey across a dimension of space that no thing was meant to exist within in this side scrolling bullet hell shooter.

Created for One Minute Game Jam #9 by myself (Gary - Direction, Art, Additional Programming, Design, Sound Effect Gathering) and some friends (blue1parrot - Gameplay Programming, Design, Mr. Mogochi - Music).
